item.title: Custom Car Stereo
item.description: All of our installers are certified by The Mobile Electronics Certified Professional (MECP) program. MECP is the only nationally recognized program that certifies mobile electronics installers and sales people on the installation techniques and capabilities of automotive information technology. Apple carplay Android Auto Subwoofers Amplifiers headunits entertainment systems navigation systems safety/security systems We have the training, the know-how, and the experience to create and install the system of your dreams. We guarantee the installation of all components for the life of your vehicle.

SoundProof Custom Car Audio can also install your lift or lowering kits for you. Call us today to schedule your lift kit installation services. item.title: Remote Starter Systems
item.description: Now you can remote start, lock and unlock your car just by pushing a button on your smartphone; using the Viper SmartStart App from Directed, the leader in vehicle security and remote start. The simple graphical interface gives you control over the following features of your installed Viper remote start or security with remote start system: Viper StartSmart Features: Lock / Arm Unlock / Disarm Remote Car Starter Trunk Release Panic Aux Channels Multi-Person - Multi-vehicle: You can also control multiple vehicles â€“ great for families!

item.title: Marine Audio
item.description: Sound Proof can Customize your boats audio system with the latest products from Wet Sounds, JL Marine, and many other quality manufacturers. We’ve installed stereo systems in Supra Moomba Malibu Axis Mastercraft Installation for: Boat RV Jet Ski

item.title: Window Tinting
item.description: At Sound Proof Custom Car Audio, we offer all types of window tinting solutions, for all types of vehicles. Ceramic film is also optional. Look Sharp: Choose from an array of optically clear and tinted films and several levels of protection to get just the look and sun protection you desire. From basic and high- performance dyed films to metal combinations and top-performing all-metal films, LLumar will fit your style just right and dramatically enhance the appearance of any vehicle.
